lines: 1. Rituko rinene ngocha rire,Yeso nachicheKoira abana abageni,Enka y'omwando.
Natorore ogokia kw'emambia,Kogoseria OmosunteNatorore ogokia, Kw'emambia,kogwata chimbera.
2. 'Mang'ana yenchilinarandigw' ebisaku bionsi,Monene bw'enyangitateban' amarandi abuge.
3. 'Ba igoro bonsi bamokobenamar' agwoka,Omogambi ache abair'abayease batakwe
4. Bari' abasani twatiganete,Natororane,Baria barosir' emioyobatinyigw' amariga.
